    • Method Detail

      • getData

        public double[] getData()
        Get the data array that was decomposed
        Returns:
        double[] the original data

      • getTrend

        public double[] getTrend()
        Get the trend component of the decomposition
        Returns:
        double[] the trend component

      • getSeasonal

        public double[] getSeasonal()
        Get the seasonal component of the decomposition
        Returns:
        double[] the seasonal component

      • getResidual

        public double[] getResidual()
        Get the residual remaining after removing the seasonality and trend from the data.
        Returns:
        double[] the residuals

      • getWeights

        public double[] getWeights()
        Get the robustness weights used in the calculation. Places where the weights are near zero indicate outliers that were effectively ignored during the decomposition. (Only applicable if robustness iterations are performed.)
        Returns:
        double[] the robustness weights

      • smoothSeasonal

        public void smoothSeasonal(int width)
        Smooth the STL seasonal component with quadratic LOESS and recompute the residual.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the LOESS smoother used to smooth the seasonal component.
